snippet.title: Nails In The Coffin: 6 Examples Of Recognition Gone Wrong
snippet.description: Stacks of research have proven that purposeful employee recognition can ignite engagement, accelerate performance, and build strong cultures. But, can recognition go wrong? Well, what does bad recognition look like anyway? Through the years, we’ve heard stories of managers who mispronounced employee names while presenting awards for achievement. [...] read »

snippet.title: Will Sprint's Final Clearwire Offer Seal The Deal?
snippet.description: Sprint said that the sweetened offer was its ‘best and final’ one, implying that it isn’t willing to enter into a protracted bidding war to acquire the remaining nearly 50% of Clearwire that it doesn’t already own. read »

snippet.title: 6 Lessons From An American Renegade
snippet.description: English: City seal of Detroit, Michigan. snippet.title: Navy SEAL Memoirist Also Consulted On Video Game
snippet.description: Since leaving the Navy last year, it seems that former SEAL Matt Bissonnette has been keeping himself busy. Earlier this week, Bissonnette was revealed as the author of a forthcoming memoir about the raid that killed Osama bin Laden. Now, an unnamed source has told the Los Angeles Times that Bissonnette, [...] read »

snippet.title: Navy Seals Face Disciplinary Action After Consulting On 'Medal Of Honor: Warfighter'
snippet.description: The US government has produced its own video game in the past, but Navy SEALS caught moonlighting for EA are facing disciplinary action. read »

snippet.title: How to run a startup like a SEAL Platoon
